sentences.sContent: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.sCn: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

sentences.sContent: His own children have a prior claim to the business.
sentences.sCn: 他自己的孩子可以优先获得这家企业。

sentences.sContent: All the arrangements should be completed prior to your departure.
sentences.sCn: 你离开之前一切都要安排好。

phrases.pCn: 事先批准；预先审批；事前批准；事前许可；预先核准

remMethod.val: pri(=prim， 第一， 首要)+or→排在第一的→优先的， 在前的

words.tran: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事
把事情按优先顺序排好

trans.tranOther: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation
